Question: Zhejiang Crossbow Brand Electrical Appliance Co. L CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhejiang Crossbow Brand Electrical Appliance Co. Ltd

Product: Smart bladeless fan

- Established in 2004
- Strategic partnership with TUYA smart and XIAOMI
- Design awards in 2019 and 2020
- Manufacturing space of over 25000 sq. meters
- Annual sales quantity for bladeless fan around 500,000 pcs
- Export mainly to Europe, North America, Korea, and Japan
- Holds around 150 design/structure patents
- Certifications include BSCI, ISO9001:2015, GS, CE, ETL, KC, PSE, ROHS, REACH, ERP
- Features UV sterilization and air purifier
- Joint development with Panasonic/Huawei for new smart bladeless fan heater
Summary_cn:
浙江虹弓电器有限公司

产品：智能无叶风扇

- 成立于2004年
- 与图雅智能和小米建立战略合作伙伴关系
- 在2019年和2020年获得设计奖
- 制造面积超过25000平方米
- 无叶风扇年销量约为50万台
- 主要出口到欧洲、北美、韩国和日本
- 拥有约150项设计/结构专利
- 认证包括BSCI、ISO9001:2015、GS、CE、ETL、KC、PSE、ROHS、REACH、ERP
- 具有紫外线杀菌和空气净化功能
- 与松下/华为合作开发新的智能无叶风扇加热器
